Receivables days = Average receivables / Revenue from Operations *365
Inventory days = Average inventory / Cost of sales *365
Payable days = Average (Payables + Acceptances) / Material costs *365
Working Capital (in days) = Receivables days – Payables days + Inventory days.
Source: Annual reports, Quarterly reports, Crisil Intelligence
